name: AuraReading
0:
”Alexa, open aura reading”
”Alexa, ask aura reading for my fortune”
”Alexa, start aura reading”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aura reading
des:
Ask Alexa to open Aura Reading
She will need a moment to see your energy field
She will then explain the color and give you a message based on the color energy.
The aura does fluctuate and change during the day, so consult her when you feel an energy shift.
Charmed in Company LLP is the oldest Mystical Metaphysical shoppe in NJ. We created this skill as a fun and entertaining way to learn about aura color energy.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
